long_description: Boasting a hand-activated brake for extra safety on steep hills, the BOB Revolution Pro Stroller lets you and your little one get outside for a run or a stroll with its user-friendly features. Adjustable padded handlebar creates the perfect fit for any parent's height with 9 comfortable positions. 12 in. swiveling front wheel allows for excellent maneuverability; locks forward for increased stability while jogging or when the terrain turns tough. Front wheel tracking can also be easily adjusted with a dial to keep you rolling straight, and inflatable rear wheels roll over city streets or dirt trails. 2-step folding design supplies convenient transport and storage. Adjustable suspension system smooths out bumpy terrain and supplies a comfortable ride for your passenger. Padded and adjustable reclining seat offers great seating comfort; 5-point padded harness keeps child secure. Multi-position canopy can be independently adjusted for protection against the elements; large viewing window on top lets you keep an eye on your kid. Store extra clothing, food and more with the large seat-back pocket and Low Boy undercarriage cargo basket. Padded handlebar with safety strap; foot-actuated parking brake.
